EmailTemplate.name: Quote Create Customer Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell RFQ Acknowledgement Reference Quote#: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact_Name__c},
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. Your RFQ has been received and the case tracking number for this inquiry is {!Case.Case_Number__c}. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry or place an order on this quote, please click on the link below and then Login.
To login or create a Honeywell ID Account and get RFQ Status, click here.
Or, reply to this e-mail with your PO attached -- If you reply to this e-mail, please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
Thank you, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
